text: io is too generic, and when people import it in the code, it looses its meaning.
title: Rename nilearn.io to nilearn.nifti_io?

text:
Meeting: tomorrow, as @pgervais is leaving on holidays. Let's say after
lunch.
I think we should have a meeting about issue #58 to set up this kind of things and refactor the code once and for all. Maybe before you leave @GaelVaroquaux ?
I agree that io is not specific enough. nifti_io is better.
